cast.name: 阿列克谢·赛尔 Alexei Sayle
彼得·理查德森 Peter Richardson

director.name: 鲍勃·施皮尔斯 Bob Spiers

this_title: The Comic Strip Presents: Didn't You Kill My Brother?
introduction: Carl Moss leaves jail,where he has taken the rap for his evil twin Sterling,and has been declared a model prisoner. Pauline Sneek,his probation officer - and girlfriend - gets him community work teaching youngsters how to lead law-abiding lives. This displeases Sterling,as he needs young delinquents for his bicycle stealing ring,and there is a showdown which results in the death of one of the twins - but which is it? Written by don @ minifie-1
chinese_title: The Comic Strip Presents: Didn't You Kill My Brother?
